price: 12. seehadaytu gibda kaa xagtek woo gibda kaak kallamkeh qaxah inaaqitak hinnay daffeyak hinnay soolak Nee kaliaca, Tokkel woo gibda kaak kalia waqdi kaa xagteh tan gibdah nee kallaceweeh innah, edde suge koroosannut warrayak raaqa, tonnaah Yallal koroositaanam kee kay Ambiya dirabbossaanamat caddok tatre marah abak sugen urna taamoomi keenit bilqisimteh.
arabic: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ ٱلضُّرُّ دَعَانَا لِجَنۢبِهِۦٓ أَوۡ قَاعِدًا أَوۡ قَآئِمٗا فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُ ضُرَّهُۥ مَرَّ كَأَن لَّمۡ يَدۡعُنَآ إِلَىٰ ضُرّٖ مَّسَّهُۥۚ كَذَٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā massa al-insāna al-ḍuru daʿānā lijanbihi aw qāʿidan aw qāiman falammā kashafnā ʿanhu ḍurrahu marra ka-an lam yadʿunā ilā ḍurrin massahu kadhālika zuyyina lil'mus'rifīna mā kānū yaʿmalūna
